titles: The noble lyfe a[nd] natures of man of bestes, serpentys, fowles a[nd] fisshes [that] be moste knoweu [sic].
author: Andrew, Laurence, fl. 1510-1537.
publisher: Emprented by me Ioh[a]n of Doesborowe],
notes: A translation, by Laurence Andrew, from a Dutch version of parts of: Hortus sanitatis.
Place of publication and printer's name name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 22367 on UMI microfilm reel 1495.
Imperfect at end; last leaf in facsimile.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine Library.
